name: react-rx
description: An RxJS Observable Interface to Facebook's React

scripts.test-node: npm run test-common && npm run test-onlynode
scripts.test: npm run jshint && npm run jscs && npm run test-node && npm run test-browser
scripts.travis-test: npm run jshint && npm run jscs && npm run test-node
scripts.dist: mkdir -p dist && npm run browserify && npm run uglify
scripts.release-patch: git checkout master && npm run dist; git commit -a -m 'Build dist/'; npm version patch && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
scripts.release-minor: git checkout master && npm run dist; git commit -a -m 'Build dist/'; npm version minor && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
scripts.release-major: git checkout master && npm run dist; git commit -a -m 'Build dist/'; npm version major && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
